scripts.ci-deploy: git config --global user.name "github-actions[bot]" && git config --global user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com" && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && git fetch origin gh-pages && git worktree add -B gh-pages -f public origin/gh-pages && npm run build && (cd public; git add .) && (cd public; git commit -m "Release $(git log '--format=format:%H' master -1)") && git push origin gh-pages
